narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Southern California Permanente Medical Group is a Health Maintenance Organization provider based in Anaheim, CA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $17.8M in Medicaid payments across 2.7M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $17.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
